original: intros p q Cp Cq. unfold poly in Cp, Cq. destruct Cp as [sp Cp]. destruct Cq as [sq Cq]. unfold spolyf. exists (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM (spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec sp sq)). unfold reducible, divide in Cp, Cq. destruct Cp as [q1 [Hdiv1 Heq1]]. destruct Cq as [q2 [Hdiv2 Heq2]]. split. - exists q1. split. + eapply canonical_spminusf; eauto. + rewrite <-Hdiv1. rewrite <-Hdiv2. apply reduce_in_pO. - unfold eqP, eq_poly. simpl. rewrite Heq1, Heq2. reflexivity.
